Structs/Polygon/MeshRenderingMode.html#/.name: face
Structs/Polygon/MeshRenderingMode.html#/.abstract: Draws only the edges that comprise the outer contour of the shape, thus rendering the “face”.

Structs/Polygon/MeshRenderingMode.html#/.name: wireframe
Structs/Polygon/MeshRenderingMode.html#/.abstract: Draws all edges that connect each vertex of the polygon’s inner triangles.

Structs/Polygon.html#/s:7PolygonAAV5side.name: sides
Structs/Polygon.html#/s:7PolygonAAV5side.abstract: The number of sides belonging to the polygon.

Structs/Polygon.html#/s:7PolygonAAV11sid.name: sidesToDraw
Structs/Polygon.html#/s:7PolygonAAV11sid.abstract: As the decimal part of the newest side grows, this side will go from zero to its full length.

Structs/Polygon.html#/s:7PolygonAAV10hyp.name: hypotenuse(in:)
Structs/Polygon.html#/s:7PolygonAAV10hyp.abstract: A hypotenuse computed to fit inside the available rect
